item.title: whoami
item.description: Hey there, this is Khoi. Probality, you are here because you want to know more about me. So, let’s get started. I am a junior at HCMIU. I am currently pursuing Computer Science. I am interested in web development, security and so on. Beside tech, i also enjoy movies, music and books. I’m making this blog to share my knowledge and experience. Hopefully, you will find something useful here. Btw I use arch.
